topic.title: Tooltips
topic.shortdesc: Documentation and examples for adding custom Bootstrap tooltips with CSS and JavaScript using CSS3 for animations and data-bs-attributes for local title storage.

section.title: Overview
section.p: Things to know when using the tooltip plugin:

ul.li: Tooltips rely on the third-party library Popper for positioning.
Tooltips are opt-in for performance reasons, so you must initialize them yourself by setting --popovers.include=yes.
Tooltips with a zero-length desc element are never displayed.
Triggering tooltips on hidden elements will not work.
Tooltips for outputclass="disabled" elements must be triggered on a wrapper element.
Tooltips must be hidden before their corresponding elements have been removed from the DOM.
Tooltips can be triggered thanks to an element inside a shadow DOM.

section.title: Custom tooltips
section.p: You can customize the appearance of tooltips using CSS variables. We set a custom class with <data name="class">custom-tooltip<data> to scope our custom appearance and use it to override a local CSS variable.
